title: Replace app icon with new circular Rawly41 logo

requirements.text: Replace all existing app icons (192x192, 512x512, and Apple touch icons) referenced in frontend/public/manifest.json and frontend/index.html with the newly uploaded circular Rawly41 logo featuring pink dripping text on turquoise swirl background with white border (Gemini_Generated_Image_z68096z68096z680-6.png)

quotes: How I change it from this icon to this

acceptanceCriteria: All icon sizes (192x192, 512x512, 180x180 for Apple) use the new circular Rawly41 logo with white border
The manifest.json file references the updated icon files
The index.html Apple touch icon link points to the new icon
When installed as a PWA, the app displays the new circular logo on the home screen

nonGoals: Changing the app name or branding colors
Modifying the manifest structure beyond icon references

required: Circular app icon with pink dripping 'Rawly41' text on turquoise swirl background with white border, sized for standard web app icon (icon-192.dim_192x192.png)
Circular app icon with pink dripping 'Rawly41' text on turquoise swirl background with white border, sized for large web app icon (icon-512.dim_512x512.png)
Circular app icon with pink dripping 'Rawly41' text on turquoise swirl background with white border, sized for Apple touch icon (apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png)
